captions.text:
00:03
COMM: The picture of true bliss, this two

week old puppy enjoys a relaxing bath. And
he’s so laid back, he almost falls asleep

00:13
COMM: The clean canine was filmed by Claire

Fowler, a volunteer at the DFW Rescue Me animal
shelter in Dallas, Texas

00:21
Claire: The reason why I filmed giving this
little guy a bath was because he was so content.

00:27
Claire: I really like to document the puppies

as they grow, especially with bottle babies,
and he was just falling asleep so I had to
capture that moment.

00:37
Claire: Our organisation DFW Rescue Me save

dogs from local animal shelters are about
to be euthanised or abandoned, neglected or
abusive intuitions.

00:47
Claire: We got a call from Dallas Animal Services

and there were three puppies that were abandoned
in a bag that were found outside a dumpster
in Dallas, Texas.

00:55
COMM: And with no mum around, these tiny dogs

take plenty of looking after, so Claire took
them home.

01:01
Claire: What people don't realise is that

bottle babies require a lot of time and special
care.

01:06
Claire: Not only do they have to be bottle

fed every 2 to 4 hours, but they can't go
to the restroom on their own.

01:11
Mum helps them with that and since there's
no mum we do everything here.

01:16
COMM: Keeping the puppies clean is very important,

and this little one really doesn’t seem
to mind at all.

01:22
Claire: I bathe the puppies often since I'm
mum. I've got to make sure they're clean.

01:26
Claire: Since they were found in a dumpster

they were covered in fleas, so we've been
trying to get rid of the fleas since fleaing
them can actually kill puppies quickly.

01:34
Claire: So right now the puppies don't have

names since they're just under two weeks old
and we're thinking about it. Trying to decide
on some strong names for these three.

title: Cute Puppy Shower: Rescued Pup Enjoys Bath Time
